result.title: Design of the cloud controller, open APIs, PDA, TT and data Marketplace
result.description: This deliverable will provide the complete design of the cloud controller, the open APIs and the three integrated components, the PDA, the TT and the data Marketplace with a special attention to their relations with the core components (T5.1, T5.2, T5.3, T5.4, T5.5). A clear specification of which Partner will be responsible for hosting each component of PIMCity Platform will be detailed.
